sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form @submit.prevent="submitForm">
    <input type="text" v-model="formData.name" placeholder="Nome" required>
    <input type="email" v-model="formData.email" placeholder="Email" required>
    <input type="tel" v-model="formData.phone" placeholder="Telefone" required>
    <input type="text" v-model="formData.address" placeholder="Endereço">
    <input type="file" @change="handleFileUpload" accept="image/*">

    <button type="submit">Adicionar contato</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  name: 'AddContactForm',
  data() {
    return {
      formData: {
        name: '',
        email: '',
        phone: '',
        celular: '',
        address: '',
        bairro: '',
        estado: '',
        photo: '',
      },
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async submitForm() {
      try {
        if (this.formData.photo instanceof File) {
          const fileData = new FormData();
          fileData.append('photo', this.formData.photo);
          const uploadResponse = await axios.post('http://localhost:8000/api/upload-image', fileData);
          this.formData.photo = uploadResponse.data.temporaryPath;
        }

        const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:8000/api/clientes', this.formData);
        console.log('Resposta da API:', response.data);
        this.resetForm();
        this.$emit('contactAdded', response.data);
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Erro ao adicionar contato:', error);
      }
    },
    handleFileUpload(event) {
      const file = event.target.files[0];
      if (file) {
        this.formData.photo = file;
      }
    },
    resetForm() {
      this.formData = {
        name: '',
        email: '',
        phone: '',
        address: '',
        photo: '',
      };
    },
  }
};
</script>
